member.name: T:CommonApi.ErrorCode
member.summary: List of the serveur error code

member.name: F:CommonApi.ErrorCode.InvalidParameter
member.summary: One of the input parameter is incorect

member.name: F:CommonApi.ErrorCode.OrderLocked
member.summary: Loyalty card is not in the list of active cards

member.name: F:CommonApi.ErrorCode.UnknownLoyaltyCard
member.summary: Loyalty card is not in the list of active cards

member.name: F:CommonApi.ErrorCode.LoyaltyCardNotActive
member.summary: This loyalty card is not attached to any user

member.name: F:CommonApi.ErrorCode.InsufficientUserBalance
member.summary: User balance insufficient to validate order.

member.name: F:CommonApi.ErrorCode.InsufficientUserBalanceDueToOngoingService
member.summary: User balance insufficient to validate order because an ongoing service (like beer dispenser service) makes the user balance insufficient.

member.name: F:CommonApi.ErrorCode.OngoingBeerService
member.summary: Error return in case of ongoing beer service

member.name: F:CommonApi.ErrorCode.UserError
member.summary: User related error (user unknwon or information missing)

member.name: F:CommonApi.ErrorCode.RateLimit
member.summary: Returned when the rate limit has been reached

member.name: T:CommonApi.GuidedActivityProductGroupType
member.summary: Possible user selection (only one or multiple choices)

member.name: F:CommonApi.GuidedActivityProductGroupType.Single
member.summary: Can select only a single of the choice (for exemple the choice of a cooking level)

member.name: F:CommonApi.GuidedActivityProductGroupType.Multiple
member.summary: Can select each choice multiple time Additional ingredient in a pizza

member.name: F:CommonApi.GuidedActivityProductGroupType.OneOfEachChoice
member.summary: Can choose at most one of each choice Typically the list of choice could be the list of choice which could be removed

member.name: T:CommonApi.HomeState
member.summary:
Empty is default: product is showed only in catalog (including Guided Activities) Carte: Product is showed on the first page of the catalog Suggestion: Product is showed BEFORE the catalog is displayed to the user
See the Guided Actitivy class for similar concepts.

member.name: T:CommonApi.WorkingOrderType
member.summary: List possible values for Working Orders

member.name: F:CommonApi.WorkingOrderType.Others
member.summary: Does not include menu. Can be for salt and pepper of non-eatable products (like teddy bear).
